document.full_text: japan plans to take control of tokyo electric power co, the operator of the country's stricken nuclear plant, in the face of mounting public concerns over the crisis and a huge potential compensation bill, a newspaper reported on friday.
document.title: japan plans to bail out stricken nuclear plant
lines_and_colors: japan plans to take control of tokyo electric power co, the operator of the country's stricken nuclear plant, in the face of mounting public concerns over the crisis and a huge potential compensation bill, a newspaper reported on friday.
